long_description: Made of a breathable, moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric, the Patagonia Nine Trails skort is ready to make an appearance on your favorite running routes. Recycled polyester and spandex creates a durable and stretchy outer fabric that breathes well, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Fabric is soft, lightweight, and smooth to the touch; plus, it's treated with a durable water repellent finish to resist splashes and light rain. Odor-resistant stretch boy-shorts liner with a shaped leg for chafe-free comfort. Flattering knit waistband with external-tying drawcord. Center back envelope pocket and drop-in gel pockets at hips. Single-layer skirt with side splits at hem provides good coverage and full range of motion. Patagonia Nine Trails skort features reflective logos to increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: Made of a breathable, moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric, the Patagonia Nine Trails skort is ready to make an appearance on your favorite running routes.
